description.value:
Your freshly spilled blood is sanctified, and ingesting it causes effects similar to those of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Holy Water].

Whenever a fiend, undead, or creature with a weakness to good damage drinks your blood or deals piercing or slashing damage to you with jaws, fangs, or a similar attack, that creature takes [[/r 1d6[good]]] damage.

You gain a +4 circumstance bonus to Crafting checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Craft] @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Holy Water] using your own blood as one of the ingredients.

rules.label: Blessed Blood (craft Holy Water with own blood)
